title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for qualified distributed thermal energy storage property, and for other purposes.
content: Thermal Energy Cooling and Heating Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) a residential energy efficient property tax credit for 30 of expenditures for distributed thermal energy storage property installed in a principal residence. (2) a 30 energy tax credit for investment in qualified distributed thermal storage property prior to 2017. And (3) financing of qualified distributed thermal energy storage property with new clean renewable energy bonds.
